extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

attributes.name: CookTime
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the total cook time associated with the operation of the device.

attributes.name: MaxCookTime
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the maximum value to which the CookTime attribute can be set.

attributes.name: PowerSetting
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the power level associated with the operation of the device.

attributes.name: MinPower
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the minimum value to which the PowerSetting attribute that can be set on the server.

attributes.name: MaxPower
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the maximum value to which the PowerSetting attribute that can be set on the server.

attributes.name: PowerStep
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the increment of power that can be set on the server.

attributes.name: SupportedWatts
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the list of power levels (in W) supported by the server.

attributes.name: SelectedWattIndex
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the index into the list of SupportedWatts of the currently selected power setting.

attributes.name: WattRating
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the rating, in Watts, of the microwave power of the oven.

parameters.valueRange: CookMode: uint8(desc), CookTime: elapsed-s(1-MaxCookTime), PowerSetting: uint8(MinPower-MaxPower), WattSettingIndex: uint8(desc), StartAfterSetting: bool
parameters.description: Composite parameter structure for cooking settings
TimeToAdd parameter for extending cooking duration
